All Missionaries born in this city can spread religion three times.
Pilgrims

A unique settler type unit that can only be purchased with faith. This unit can settle cities and spread a religion once at slightly lower strength than the missionary.[NEWLINE]This unit is available for adopting all policies in the piety tree.
Pilgrims set up camps and outposts when they travel, often returning to those lands to reduce travel times in future pilgrimages.
